rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious entrance area that welcomes guests with Art Deco detailing and incorporates Vastu principles for a positive energy flow. Floor-to-ceiling windows allow natural light.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: An expansive living room featuring Art Deco elements such as geometric patterns and elegant furnishings, complemented by floor-to-ceiling windows that blend indoor and outdoor space.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living area, offering an open plan dining experience. The design incorporates Vastu principles for balanced energy in communal spaces.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A modern kitchen with Art Deco fixtures and a functional layout. It includes ample natural light through carefully placed floor-to-ceiling windows.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: An exclusive gym area designed for fitness, featuring Vastu-aligned positioning to promote health and balance. Incorporates open space with floor-to-ceiling windows to enhance air circulation.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A functional bathroom with Art Deco detailing ensuring both style and functionality. Designed following local building norms and Vastu guidelines for positive energy flow.

courtyard.description: A central courtyard designed as an open space for relaxation and natural ventilation, following Vastu principles for harmonious energy distribution.
